content: *choose five colors of fingering weight yarn and fade them from light to dark with this wide wrap this textured fabric is knitted with the fascinating dip stitch technique this elegant stitch pattern forms a biased shape with beautiful diagonal lines the elongated stitches formed by the dip stitch form lovely little waves in the fabric that look like shells or scales you can easily customize the length of this wrap by simply binding off early for a shorter size or knit using all your yarn for the longest size this pattern includes a video tutorial demonstrating the dip stitch technique cast on and learn something new * **finished measurements** 88″ / 224cm long 16″ / 41cm wide measurements taken after blocking the length is customizable **yarn** fingering weight **yardage** approximately 2000yds / 1830m total color a - 400yds / 366m color b - 400yds / 366m color c - 400yds / 366m color d - 400yds / 366m color e - 400yds / 366m **shown in** qing fibre dashing sassy 100% superwash ultrafine south african merino 437yds /400m per 100g skein color a - splash lightest color b - beach color c - jewel color d - mermaid color e - treasure darkest **needles** us 4 / 3 5mm in 24″ / 60cm length or size needed to obtain gauge you can use straight needles if you prefer **notions** tapestry needle **gauge** 24 sts & 36 row = 4″ / 10cm in dip stitch after blocking **westknits workshops** venture into the world of westknits with my series of online workshops westknits workshops can be watched as many times as you like and at your own pace as you learn new knitting skills sign up here https //www westknits com/collections/workshops **westknits kits** we have dozens of curated color palettes to inspire your next westknits project collect a westknits kit at stephen & penelope we ship worldwide https //www stephenandpenelope com/pages/westknits-kits **westknits on youtube** check out my videos on youtube for some helpful tutorials and an exciting insight into the woolly world of westknits https //www youtube com/@stephenwest all rights reserved pattern for personal use only
